title: Foundations of Higher Mathematics
description: Fundamental concepts and methods of higher mathematics.

subTopics.description: Fundamental concepts of set theory and mappings between sets.

subTopics.title: Mathematical Induction
subTopics.description: The method of mathematical induction as a proof technique.

subTopics.description: The binomial formulas and their applications.

subTopics.description: The greatest common divisor and its properties.

subTopics.description: The complex numbers and their geometric interpretation.

1. Introduction

Higher mathematics forms the foundation for many scientific disciplines and technical applications.

Important Areas:

  • Set Theory and Logic
  • Algebraic Structures
  • Analysis
  • Linear Algebra
